overview: Fira Basuki is a quite popular novelist and editor-in-chief of Cosmopolitan magazine, an upscale women's magazine. His figure is milling about among Jakarta's socialites. As a mature woman with the gift of modern beauty and stability as well as highly educated, it is not difficult for her to relate to men.  But finding a man as a companion for life is never easy with Fira's status as a widow with one child.
title: Cinta Selamanya
